review.reviewBody: I always get the chicken melt waffle and ice d salted cararme coffee and it tastes like heaven with their balsa vinegar dressing.
The Croftle Egg Sandwich is outstanding. Its crispy waffle gives a great crunch when biting into the egg salad with arugula as a tasty finish.
Egg droffle was amazing and very generpus serv8ng almost good for 2  people.Eggs 9n salmon benny was a bit sad,it was cooked perfectly but very small,and i requested for cuttleries but didnt get any.
The Salmon Benny is amazing, The Croffle Club Sandwich is an incredible value and I absolutely love their coffee in a can - it's delicious and convenient.
This was honestly so delicious the croffle was the perfect consistency and the poached egg was cooked to perfection. Very generous portion. 100 percent would order again.
